game.name: 气运之子The One of Fortune
game.shortDescription: Step into the mysterious and boundless world of Chinese-style fantasy. Gather the mysterious power of destiny. You can either assume the role of the revered leader of the righteous path, or transform into the powerful Demon Lord of the evil path.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the mysterious and boundless world of Chinese-style fantasy. Gather the mysterious power of destiny. You can either assume the role of the revered leader of the righteous path, or transform into the powerful Demon Lord of the evil path.
